Name: BURNVEG2SOILABVN

Description: Input driving precip data after being split from snowfall

Name: DRIVINGSNOWFALL

Name: INNUPTAKE
Description: Unlimited N uptake by plants. N uptake by happy plants when N is not limited.

Description: Water uptake by roots per layer
